article.title: Report of my work on project Collection of XSLT Examples

chapter.title: My assignment
chapter.para: I was assigned to create two web pages with XSLT examples:

itemizedlist.listitem: Construction of elements using literal elements

chapter.title: Construction of elements using literal elements
chapter.para: I created a web page which defines what literal element is and how it is copied to the output. Then I showed an example with two input files (XML file and XSLT file) and displayed output and processor output.

chapter.title: Processing mode
chapter.para: I created a web page about processing mode. I included detailed definition of operations of XSLT processor. I also focused on <xsl:processing-instruction> element which I defined and showed syntax and its attributes. Then I showed an example with XSLT code and the tag it creates.

chapter.title: Try button update
chapter.para: Finally I updated all pages in the project with "Try it yourself" button so that XSLT Live processor can be used as a help to understand the transformation and all examples mentioned.
